00038 #if defined(_X86PAE_)
00039 #define PPI_BITS    2
00040 #define PDI_BITS    9
00041 #define PTI_BITS    9
00042 #else
00043 #define PPI_BITS    0
00044 #define PDI_BITS    10
00045 #define PTI_BITS    10
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #define PPI_MASK    ((1 << PPI_BITS) - 1)
00049 #define PDI_MASK    ((1 << PDI_BITS) - 1)
00050 #define PTI_MASK    ((1 << PTI_BITS) - 1)
00051 
00052 #define KiGetPpeIndex(va) ((((ULONG)(va)) >> PPI_SHIFT) & PPI_MASK)
00053 #define KiGetPdeIndex(va) ((((ULONG)(va)) >> PDI_SHIFT) & PDI_MASK)
00054 #define KiGetPteIndex(va) ((((ULONG)(va)) >> PTI_SHIFT) & PTI_MASK)
